LanguageData.Reaver.degreeDatas.0.label: reaver
LanguageData.Reaver.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME has displayed a natural affinity for melee weapons and abhors ranged.
LanguageData.Dumb.degreeDatas.0.label: dumb
LanguageData.Dumb.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME isn't the sharpest tool in the shed, but that hasn't stopped HIM from getting this far.
LanguageData.ChaoticGenius.degreeDatas.0.label: volatile genius
LanguageData.ChaoticGenius.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME is unbelievably smart, however HE is also extremely unstable
LanguageData.Ignorant.degreeDatas.0.label: dunce
LanguageData.Ignorant.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME is a bit of a dunce, and learns at a slower rate than others.
LanguageData.DIY.degreeDatas.0.label: builder
LanguageData.DIY.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME loved playing with construction toys as a child, and still enjoys the thrill of "putting things together." But HE tends to be a bit lost without clear instructions to follow.
LanguageData.Strong.degreeDatas.0.label: Strong
LanguageData.Weak.degreeDatas.0.label: weak
LanguageData.Religious.degreeDatas.0.label: religious
LanguageData.Religious.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME has found faith and peace of mind in HIS religion and is more prepared for what may come than others.
LanguageData.Fanatic.degreeDatas.0.label: fanatic
LanguageData.Fanatic.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME has found religon and is prepared to do what ever is required to make others accept its truth.
LanguageData.Cultist.degreeDatas.0.label: cultist
LanguageData.Cultist.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME has heard the call constantly since HE was young. HECAP has followed it across the galaxy, worshipping the soothing sound until HE finally found its source. However on the planet that houses HIS god the call is intermitant, and only occasionally can HE hear its soothing song.
LanguageData.Naive.degreeDatas.0.label: naive
LanguageData.Naive.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME is a generally happy and likable person, but death bothers HIM more than others.
LanguageData.Numb.degreeDatas.0.label: numb
LanguageData.Numb.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME is emotionally numb and as such is very non-expressive about most things.
LanguageData.Hardened.degreeDatas.0.label: hardened
LanguageData.Hardened.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME has become accustomed to the harsh reality of death and the horrible things that sometimes need to be done. This has made HIM more mentally stable.
LanguageData.Tough.degreeDatas.0.label: Tough
LanguageData.Paranoid.degreeDatas.0.label: paranoid
LanguageData.Paranoid.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME believes that everyone is out to get HIM and for the first time in HIS life, HE seems to be right.
LanguageData.Confident.degreeDatas.0.label: confident
LanguageData.Confident.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME is fairly confident that everything is going to be alright.
LanguageData.Pragmatist.degreeDatas.0.label: pragmatic
LanguageData.Pragmatist.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME is practical, and will cross any line if it serves HIM best. HE isn't bothered by limiting moral choices, after all, HE is just looking out for number 1.
LanguageData.Fast.degreeDatas.0.label: quick
LanguageData.Slow.degreeDatas.0.label: slow
LanguageData.Personality.degreeDatas.0.label: Silver Tongue
LanguageData.Personality.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME likes to talk and hates to fight, fortunately for HIM, HE's good at talking HIS way out of almost anything.
LanguageData.Personality.degreeDatas.1.label: Born Leader
LanguageData.Personality.degreeDatas.1.description: NAME has been a leader since the first time HECAP made a friend, people are drawn to HIM naturally.
LanguageData.Introvert.degreeDatas.0.label: shy
LanguageData.Extrovert.degreeDatas.0.label: extrovert
LanguageData.Leader.degreeDatas.0.label: Natural leader
LanguageData.Villian.degreeDatas.0.label: villian
LanguageData.Villian.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME is the villian of this story.
LanguageData.AnimalLover.degreeDatas.0.label: animal lover
LanguageData.AnimalLover.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME loves animals. HECAP doesn't feel quite the same about people, though.
LanguageData.Allergic.degreeDatas.0.label: animal hater
LanguageData.Allergic.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME just isn't an "animal person." HECAP doesn't like animals, and for the record, they don't seem to much like HIM, either.
LanguageData.Photophobia.degreeDatas.0.label: photophobic
LanguageData.Photophobia.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME has an aversion to light, prefering the safety of the dark.
LanguageData.Pyrophobia.degreeDatas.0.label: pyrophobia
LanguageData.Pyrophobia.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME hates fire. HECAP will refuse to get close to fire to put it out.
